Coastal.description: Low-lying coastal exposure; beach/shoreline sensitivity and storm-surge/SLR risk.
Coastal.evidence: Coastal talukas face SLR and extreme rainfall-driven flooding; ~15% land <15m elevation highly vulnerable.

Water.description: Water security stressed by higher ET losses and heavier downpours causing variable recharge.
Water.evidence: Projected temp rise increases evapotranspiration; rainfall variability increases.

Agriculture.description: Rainfall variability and extreme events impact kharif windows; saline ingress risk in coastal belts.
Agriculture.evidence: Decrease/stability in mean rainfall with higher extremes; coastal saline intrusion risk noted.

Health.description: Heat stress days expected to increase; very heavy rainfall events to rise.
Health.evidence: 40°C days by ~2040 become more common; very heavy/extreme rainfall increases.

Urban_Flooding.description: Flash flooding risk in low-lying settlements during very heavy rain spells.
Urban_Flooding.evidence: Rising very heavy rainfall frequency; low elevation coastal pockets.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Habitat/wetland management needed to buffer heat and floods; ecosystem-based adaptation.
Forests_Biodiversity.evidence: SAPCC calls for urban wetland roles & habitat measures for CC mitigation/adaptation.

Coastal.description: High coastal exposure with tourism beaches; erosion and surge risk.
Coastal.evidence: Coastal taluka with popular beaches; low-lying exposure noted.

Urban_Flooding.description: Identified as the most vulnerable to flood-related hazards in state analyses.
Urban_Flooding.evidence: SAPCC flood vulnerability map: Bardez most vulnerable to flooding-related hazards.

Water.description: Heavier extremes with interspersed dry spells complicate water security.
Water.evidence: Warmer climate ↑ ET; extreme rainfall ↑; water security likely to deteriorate.

Agriculture.description: Rainfall variability affects paddy & horticulture; flood-damage risk in lowlands.
Agriculture.evidence: Increase in very heavy rainfall; flood-prone lowlands.

Health.description: Heat stress and extreme rain-related health risks increasing.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Green/blue infrastructure and wetland buffers recommended.
Forests_Biodiversity.evidence: SAPCC ecosystem-based adaptation & urban wetland roles.

Coastal.description: Estuarine/coastal low-lying areas exposed to surge and extreme rainfall flooding.

Urban_Flooding.description: Intense short-duration rain spells trigger urban drainage stress.
Urban_Flooding.evidence: Very heavy & exceptional rainfall events increase.

Water.description: Water security pressure under warming and rainfall variability.
Water.evidence: ↑ ET with warming; rainfall projections variable.

Agriculture.description: Paddy/vegetable belts sensitive to waterlogging and saline ingress.

Health.description: Heat and extreme-rain event health risks.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Wetland/urban lake roles in heat mitigation and carbon sinks.
Forests_Biodiversity.evidence: SAPCC calls out urban wetlands functions.

Water.description: Rainfall variability and ET losses challenge storage; mining-impacted catchments need restoration (per SAPCC habitat actions).
Water.evidence: Water security deterioration likely under warming & extremes; habitat restoration measures proposed.

Urban_Flooding.description: Extreme rainfall events increase pluvial flood potential.

Agriculture.description: Variability in monsoon affects cropping windows; localized flood damage possible.

Health.description: Heat stress days increase inland as temps rise.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Catchment/green cover and wetland functions emphasized.

Coastal.description: Interior taluka—limited direct SLR exposure; downstream flooding still relevant.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Western Ghats ecosystems sensitive to warming & rainfall shifts; EBA prioritized.
Forests_Biodiversity.evidence: SAPCC emphasizes habitat conservation and EBA in hilly/ghat areas.

Water.description: Headwater catchments face variability; storage & soil-moisture measures required.
Water.evidence: Water security under warming + extremes likely to deteriorate.

Agriculture.description: Rain-fed belts exposed to monsoon variability; extreme rain damages.

Health.description: Heat stress and extreme events increase risks.

Urban_Flooding.description: Lower urbanization; localized flash-flood risks remain.

Coastal.description: Non-coastal; indirect impacts via basin flooding.

Water.description: Central Goa water security stress from warming/ET and rainfall variability.
Water.evidence: SAPCC water security deterioration under CC.

Agriculture.description: Rainfall variability affects cropping; flood pulses possible in low tracts.

Health.description: More hot days; health burden from heat/extremes.

Urban_Flooding.description: Intense rainfall can overwhelm drains in growing settlements.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Green buffer/wetland roles emphasized in SAPCC.

Coastal.description: Interior taluka; indirect coastal impacts minimal.
Port/estuarine coastline exposure to surge, SLR and short-duration extreme rainfall.

Urban_Flooding.description: High imperviousness + cloudbursts elevate pluvial flood risk.
Urban_Flooding.evidence: Increase in very heavy & exceptional rain events.

Water.description: Water security stress from warming and rainfall variability.

Agriculture.description: Localized paddy belts face waterlogging and saline ingress risks.

Health.description: Heat stress and flood-related health risks.

Coastal.description: Coastal tourism beaches with erosion/SLR/flood exposure.

Urban_Flooding.description: Short-duration extreme rainfall overwhelms drains in urbanizing areas.

Water.description: Higher ET + variability stresses supply and quality.

Agriculture.description: Paddy belts sensitive to floods/saline ingress; horticulture affected by extremes.

Health.description: Heat and extreme rainfall health burdens.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Western Ghats edge; ecosystem-based adaptation and corridor integrity emphasized.

Water.description: Monsoon variability with extreme events; storage & soil-moisture practices needed.

Agriculture.description: Rain-fed systems sensitive to extremes; local flood pulses.

Urban_Flooding.description: Less urbanized; localized flash flooding possible.

Coastal.description: Interior taluka; indirect coastal impacts minimal.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Ghats & protected areas—climate-sensitive habitats; EBA priority.

Water.description: Headwater/catchment sensitivity to variability; need for storage & watershed works.

Agriculture.description: Rain-fed agriculture exposed to extreme rainfall swings.

Urban_Flooding.description: Lower urbanization; local flash floods in valleys.

Forests_Biodiversity.description: Western Ghats interface; ecosystem restoration and corridor continuity prioritized.

Health.description: Heat stress and extreme-event health burden increasing.

Urban_Flooding.description: Localized flash flooding in valleys/streams during cloudbursts.

Coastal.description: Coastal tourism hubs with beach erosion, surge and SLR exposure; village-level studies show high climate vulnerability.
Coastal.evidence: Coastal exposure; recent assessments of high vulnerability in coastal villages.

Urban_Flooding.description: Localized flash/pluvial floods during intense monsoon spells.
Urban_Flooding.evidence: Increase in very heavy/extreme rainfall events.

Water.description: Warming + variability stress freshwater and wells; saline ingress risk along coast.
Water.evidence: Water security likely to deteriorate; coastal saline risk.
